name: agentkai-monorepo
description: 具有自主意识、长短期记忆、目标管理和自主决策能力的AI助手系统，其中AI助手名为'凯'(Kai)

scripts.version-and-commit: changeset version && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: version packages'
scripts.publish-all: pnpm version-and-commit && pnpm release && git push && git push --tags
scripts.link-global: pnpm build && pnpm --filter @agentkai/cli install -g && pnpm --filter @agentkai/node install -g && pnpm --filter @agentkai/browser install -g && pnpm --filter @agentkai/core install -g
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm build && ossutil64 cp -r -u packages/web/dist oss://agentkai -c ./.ossutilconfig.local

author: Peiiii
